title: Need for Speed Hot Pursuit for iPhone/iPod Touch (v1.0.1)

Drive as a cop and make the bust! Take on up to 24 Cop Career Events. Start as a rookie, collect bounty, and progress to the top of the ranks. Lay down the law with roadblocks and spike strips. Fry the racerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s electrical system with an EMP lock. Be the enforcer. Feel the power.
